attributes.action: Protection of driving licence entitlements when renewing driving licence with the DVLA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When renewing driving licences there have often been cases of peoples entitlements for other licences being removed.  This has been the case with motorcycle entitlement.  The solution at the moment is to retake the test.  How can the DVLA easily find out and fine citizens for no tax, but are incapable of simply renewing a driving licence?
